uvi.description:
efi: Change down_interruptible() in virt_efi_reset_system() to down_trylock()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.155 by commit 278e483dc79311a56304f97585d3dc7db5876282. For more details please see the references link.
